il.ac.ariel.liortamir.javalab.fsm.handler

Class AbstractStateHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • il.ac.ariel.liortamir.javalab.fsm.handler.AbstractStateHandler
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CommitHandler, CreditHandler, DefaultHandler, RefundHandler, ReserveHandler, UnReserveHandler

    public abstract class AbstractStateHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Parent class for all event handlers.
    This class contains the logical methods for all events. The default implementation returns Nack.
    Author:
    liort
